[[Version 2.4]]
* Primordial Bathysmal Vishap was released.
* '''2022-01-14''':
** The Energy drain inflicted by the Cleansing Shower attack was reduced from 20 to 10.{{Verify}}
** The HP Loss inflicted by the Cleansing Shower attack was reduced.
*** Old Formula:<br /><math>\text{HP Loss} = ( 25 \% \times \text{Character Max HP} + 900 ) \times ( 1 - \frac{\text{Remaining Energy}}{20} )</math>
*** New Formula:<br /><math>\text{HP Loss} = ( 14 \% \times \text{Character Max HP} + 200 ) \times ( 1 - \frac{\text{Remaining Energy}}{10} )</math>
